About

Dreamscape Records is an independent record label founded in January of 2016. We are a family of diverse artists from all over the world. Our main focus is exploring the vast diversity that is electronic music and searching for music makers that have potential.

Latest Blog Post

20 Aug 2015 . tech . Behind the Scenes : The New Dreamscape Website Comments

Here at Dreamscape, we believe technology plays a critical role in how we connect artists and fans, so we are proud to present to you, the new Dreamscape Website.

For now, its pretty basic, but keep your eye open for changes in the future. Its built with Jekyll, hosted on Github Pages, and uses Cloudflare for SSL.
